statements: SELECT * FROM PlantGrowthPatterns
SELECT plant_name, growth_rate FROM PlantGrowthPatterns WHERE growth_rate > 10
SELECT * FROM PlantGrowthPatterns WHERE ideal_temperature < 25.0 ORDER BY plant_name
SELECT plant_name, ideal_temperature FROM PlantGrowthPatterns ORDER BY last_observation_date DESC
SELECT plant_id, last_observation_date FROM PlantGrowthPatterns WHERE last_observation_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM PlantGrowthPatterns WHERE growth_rate > 10 ORDER BY plant_name ASC
SELECT plant_name, ideal_temperature FROM PlantGrowthPatterns WHERE ideal_temperature BETWEEN 20.0 AND 30.0 ORDER BY ideal_temperature DESC
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, growth_rate FROM PlantGrowthPatterns WHERE growth_rate < 5 AND ideal_temperature < 25.0 ORDER BY plant_id ASC
SELECT * FROM PlantGrowthPatterns WHERE last_observation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_observation_date DESC
SELECT plant_name, last_observation_date FROM PlantGrowthPatterns WHERE last_observation_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY last_observation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM plant_growth_patterns;
SELECT plant_name, growth_stage, growth_date FROM plant_growth_patterns WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT plant_name, growth_stage FROM plant_growth_patterns WHERE growth_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crop_management_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT plant_name, decision_type, recommendation FROM crop_management_decisions WHERE decision_type = 'pruning';
SELECT * FROM plant_growth_patterns WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT plant_name, growth_stage FROM plant_growth_patterns WHERE growth_stage = 'Budding';
SELECT * FROM plant_growth_patterns WHERE growth_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT plant_name, growth_stage FROM plant_growth_patterns WHERE plant_id = 3 AND growth_stage = 'Fruiting';
SELECT plant_name, growth_date, decision_type FROM plant_growth_patterns p JOIN crop_management_decisions d ON p.plant_id = d.plant_id WHERE p.plant_id = 2 AND d.decision_type = 'Pruning';
SELECT * FROM PlantData;
SELECT plant_name, growth_stage FROM PlantData WHERE plant_id = 3;
SELECT plant_name, growth_pattern FROM PlantData ORDER BY plant_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT crop_name, recommended_actions FROM CropManagement WHERE management_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM PlantData WHERE growth_stage='flowering';
SELECT plant_name, growth_stage FROM PlantData ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropManagement WHERE recommended_actions ILIKE '%watering%';
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, growth_stage FROM PlantData WHERE growth_stage='vegetative' AND plant_name ILIKE '%tomato%';
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY rainfall ASC;
SELECT * FROM plant_data
SELECT plant_name, growth_stage FROM plant_data WHERE growth_rate > 0.5
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT field_name, crop_type FROM field_data WHERE area > 10
SELECT pesticide_name, pesticide_concentration, application_date FROM management_data
SELECT * FROM plant_data ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT id, plant_name, growth_stage FROM plant_data WHERE growth_rate > 0.5;
SELECT field_name, crop_type, area FROM field_data WHERE area BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 25 AND humidity > 60;
SELECT pesticide_name, application_date FROM management_data WHERE pesticide_concentration > 0.2 ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlantGrowthPatterns ORDER BY growth_date DESC;
SELECT plant_type, growth_stage FROM PlantGrowthPatterns WHERE growth_stage > 2;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvesting_date FROM CropManagement WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT soil_type, acidity_level FROM SoilParameters WHERE acidity_level < 6.5 ORDER BY acidity_level;
SELECT worker_name, job_title FROM FarmWorkers WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PlantGrowthPatterns ORDER BY growth_date DESC;
SELECT plant_id, plant_type, growth_stage FROM PlantGrowthPatterns WHERE growth_stage > 2;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvesting_date FROM CropManagement WHERE harvesting_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT soil_type, acidity_level FROM SoilParameters WHERE acidity_level < 6.5 AND moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT worker_name, job_title, hire_date FROM FarmWorkers WHERE job_title LIKE '%Manager%';
